hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever fasts one day for the sake of Allah, Allah will move his face away from the Fire a distance of seventy autumns (years).”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي صِيَامِ يَوْمٍ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: Fasting one day in the cause of Allah
